page.title: 06School in Chesterton
page.content: In Chesterton all the schools begin at 9.00a.m. There are three schools in Chesterton - Chesterton High, Chesterton Primary and Nursery and Churchfields Primary, Infants and Nursery. There is a Baths at the High School and both Primary Schools use it for swimming lessons. The Primary Schools have different break and lunch times. At dinner time the pupils have a choice whether to go home, bring sandwiches or have a cooked meal at school for which they pay. Each half of the school day starts with taking the register. At the High School we change rooms for lessons but at the Primary Schools the pupils stay in the same classrooms. Our Headmaster is very strict but always fair. You don't get much punishment the first time you do something wrong.
